name: unshockable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If someone is unshockable, it is difficult or impossible to shock or offend them: Most doctors are unshockable. He's completely unshockable. Opposite
shockable
More examplesFewer examplesAs people became increasingly unshockable, the advertising campaigns lost their impact.She's very compassionate and unshockable.Having conducted many investigations and heard many appalling stories, I am fairly unshockable.Are audiences now unshockable?Her new paintings shocked the gallery's normally unshockable clientele.The show has made even the most unshockable critics question its ethics.
